input.sentences: during the horse race there was a balloon ride
that is interesting to see the earth above outside of a plane
could be kind of cold up there in the air
but worth it to try something new
and add it to my memory banks
output.sentences: People take a hot air baloon ride during the race to scout out a winning horse.
This they hope being on this high plane will help them in their dream to become the richest people on earth.
However, the cold air makes it difficult for the baloons to lift off.
It may not have been worth their trouble.
They have a great memory but banks can't add that to their accounts.
